title: Form Builder
shortDescription: Professional contact, order, survey and lead capture forms.
longDescription:
POWr Form Builder enables you to easily create the forms you need and then embed them anywhere on your site. With templates available you can customize your form to collect the information you need, whether it's a business contact form, a newsletter sign up form or a product order or return form. You can even create custom polls or surveys to collect customer feedback. 
 
# What are the benefits of using POWr Form Builder?   

* **Improve customer service** - The easy way to get more newsletter subscribers, grow your wholesale network, collect customer feedback and build return forms for your store.
* **Find your perfect design** - Highly customizable design, from the required fields and image elements to colors, fonts and size.
* **Measure the impact** - With a built-in dashboard and email notifications you can easily stay on top of trends and new submissions.

# Get started for free and enjoy these features:   

* Optional or required text, dropdown, multiple choice, checkbox, and image elements to collect whichever information you need.
* Form data dashboard with reports and export option to get the perfect overview over what’s on your customers’ minds.
* Email alerts and email confirmations to end-user.
* Highly customizable design: pick custom colors and fonts, adjust size, add borders, and more.
* Supports text in any language.
* Mobile responsive on any device.
* Instant access to the full POWr plugin library.

# Upgrade to remove POWr branding and unlock premium features, such as:   

* Mailchimp integration for automated list-growing.
* File attachments to let users send you documents and images.
* Multiple email admins.
* Rules for which fields to show or hide based on conditions in form.
* Custom after-submission controls: redirect to another page, allow another submission, or hide the form.
* Unlock premium features in other POWr apps.

Full pricing information is available [here] (https://www.powr.io/pricing?app_type=form-builder).

# Why users love Form Builder:   

"It's so easy to use, customizable, fast and nice. I love the way it makes my site so organized. Wished I could give it 6 stars." - theninthchicken

# Customer Support You Can Count On 

If you have any questions or need help getting Form Builder up and running, we’re here to help! Please visit our [Help Center] (https://powr-support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us) for tips, support, and answers to common questions or contact support@powr.io.

# About POWr 

POWr brings you all the tools you need for effortless business growth, all in one place. With over 50 website plugins available that are easy-to-use and customizable, you'll find everything you need to boost conversions, engage and support customers, grow your following and collect information.
author: POWr Inc.

proposedApp.title: Form Builder
proposedApp.shortDescription: Collect information & grow your email list with custom forms
proposedApp.longDescription:
POWr Form Builder enables you to easily create the forms you need and then embed them anywhere on your site. With templates available you can customize your form to collect the information you need, whether it's a business contact form, a newsletter sign up form or a product order or return form. You can even create custom polls or surveys to collect customer feedback. 
 
# What are the benefits of using POWr Form Builder?   

* **Improve customer service** - The easy way to get more newsletter subscribers, grow your wholesale network, collect customer feedback and build return forms for your store.
* **Find your perfect design** - Highly customizable design, from the required fields and image elements to colors, fonts and size.
* **Measure the impact** - With a built-in dashboard and email notifications you can easily stay on top of trends and new submissions.

# Get started for free and enjoy these features:   

* Optional or required text, dropdown, multiple choice, checkbox, and image elements to collect whichever information you need.
* Form data dashboard with reports and export option to get the perfect overview over what’s on your customers’ minds.
* Email alerts and email confirmations to end-user.
* Highly customizable design: pick custom colors and fonts, adjust size, add borders, and more.
* Supports text in any language.
* Mobile responsive on any device.
* Instant access to the full POWr plugin library.

# Upgrade to remove POWr branding and unlock premium features, such as:   

* Mailchimp integration for automated list-growing.
* File attachments to let users send you documents and images.
* Multiple email admins.
* Rules for which fields to show or hide based on conditions in form.
* Custom after-submission controls: redirect to another page, allow another submission, or hide the form.
* Unlock premium features in other POWr apps.

Full pricing information is available [here] (https://www.powr.io/pricing?app_type=form-builder).

# Why users love Form Builder:   

"It's so easy to use, customizable, fast and nice. I love the way it makes my site so organized. Wished I could give it 6 stars." - theninthchicken

# Customer Support You Can Count On 

If you have any questions or need help getting Form Builder up and running, we’re here to help! Please visit our [Help Center] (https://powr-support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us) for tips, support, and answers to common questions or contact support@powr.io.

# About POWr 

POWr brings you all the tools you need for effortless business growth, all in one place. With over 50 website plugins available that are easy-to-use and customizable, you'll find everything you need to boost conversions, engage and support customers, grow your following and collect information.

You can even create custom polls or surveys to collect customer feedback. 
 
# What are the benefits of using POWr Form Builder?   

* **Improve customer service** - The easy way to get more newsletter subscribers, grow your wholesale network, collect customer feedback and build return forms for your store.
* **Find your perfect design** - Highly customizable design, from the required fields and image elements to colors, fonts and size.
* **Measure the impact** - With a built-in dashboard and email notifications you can easily stay on top of trends and new submissions.

# Get started for free and enjoy these features:   

* Optional or required text, dropdown, multiple choice, checkbox, and image elements to collect whichever information you need.
* Form data dashboard with reports and export option to get the perfect overview over what’s on your customers’ minds.
* Email alerts and email confirmations to end-user.
* Highly customizable design: pick custom colors and fonts, adjust size, add borders, and more.
* Supports text in any language.
* Mobile responsive on any device.
* Instant access to the full POWr plugin library.

# Upgrade to remove POWr branding and unlock premium features, such as:   

* Mailchimp integration for automated list-growing.
* File attachments to let users send you documents and images.
* Multiple email admins.
* Rules for which fields to show or hide based on conditions in form.
* Custom after-submission controls: redirect to another page, allow another submission, or hide the form.
* Unlock premium features in other POWr apps.

Full pricing information is available [here] (https://www.powr.io/pricing?app_type=form-builder).

# Why users love Form Builder:   

"It's so easy to use, customizable, fast and nice. I love the way it makes my site so organized. Wished I could give it 6 stars." - theninthchicken

# Customer Support You Can Count On 

If you have any questions or need help getting Form Builder up and running, we’re here to help! Please visit our [Help Center] (https://powr-support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us) for tips, support, and answers to common questions or contact support@powr.io.

# About POWr 

POWr brings you all the tools you need for effortless business growth, all in one place. With over 50 website plugins available that are easy-to-use and customizable, you'll find everything you need to boost conversions, engage and support customers, grow your following and collect information.

proposedApp.title: Form Builder
proposedApp.shortDescription: Professional contact, order, survey and lead capture forms.
proposedApp.longDescription:
POWr Form Builder enables you to easily create the forms you need and then embed them anywhere on your site. With templates available you can customize your form to collect the information you need, whether it's a business contact form, a newsletter sign up form or a product order or return form. You can even create custom polls or surveys to collect customer feedback. 
 
# What are the benefits of using POWr Form Builder?   

* **Improve customer service** - The easy way to get more newsletter subscribers, grow your wholesale network, collect customer feedback and build return forms for your store.
* **Find your perfect design** - Highly customizable design, from the required fields and image elements to colors, fonts and size.
* **Measure the impact** - With a built-in dashboard and email notifications you can easily stay on top of trends and new submissions.

# Get started for free and enjoy these features:   

* Optional or required text, dropdown, multiple choice, checkbox, and image elements to collect whichever information you need.
* Form data dashboard with reports and export option to get the perfect overview over what’s on your customers’ minds.
* Email alerts and email confirmations to end-user.
* Highly customizable design: pick custom colors and fonts, adjust size, add borders, and more.
* Supports text in any language.
* Mobile responsive on any device.
* Instant access to the full POWr plugin library.

# Upgrade to remove POWr branding and unlock premium features, such as:   

* Mailchimp integration for automated list-growing.
* File attachments to let users send you documents and images.
* Multiple email admins.
* Rules for which fields to show or hide based on conditions in form.
* Custom after-submission controls: redirect to another page, allow another submission, or hide the form.
* Unlock premium features in other POWr apps.

Full pricing information is available [here] (https://www.powr.io/pricing?app_type=form-builder).

# Why users love Form Builder:   

"It's so easy to use, customizable, fast and nice. I love the way it makes my site so organized. Wished I could give it 6 stars." - theninthchicken

# Customer Support You Can Count On 

If you have any questions or need help getting Form Builder up and running, we’re here to help! Please visit our [Help Center] (https://powr-support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us) for tips, support, and answers to common questions or contact support@powr.io.
